dPv)E*UBL=_0H8,C8~!+: Stone Studios is an indie video-game   development studio, founded in 2023,               that is the sole creator of                "The Forbidden Forest";       a pixel art metroidvania videogame,   designed in the likes of Hollow Knight,  The Ori Games, and Super Paper Mario.

About Us            We are Stone Studios. Our goal is to create a delightful,           story-rich experience that is accessible for all ages. This                   comes through the form of The Forbidden Forest.         The Forbidden Forest is a pixel art metroidvania videogame,            designed in the likes of Hollow Knight, The Ori Games, and   Super Paper Mario. There are many other sources of inspiration       for this but if you like any of these games I'm sure you'll enjoy         the one we have to offer. If you'd like to learn more, click on               "The Forbidden Forest" at the top right of this page.
Pl ease Join our Discord!                  Thanks for Playing!
The Forbidden Forest The Forbidden Forest is a pixel art metroidvania videogame, designed in       the likes of Hollow Knight, The Ori Games, and Super Paper Mario.  Download the Demo!

About The Forbidden Forest         A small cub wakes up from his den. He has no      memory of the place he is in. Despite being in one           of the most culturally diverse places of all    Wildeland, it is unsettlingly quiet. In the distance he  sees a small rock structure. It looks similar to what        he is in. He treks towards it in hope of finding   someone who knows anything about this fantastic       world. The only sound is the wind, his footsteps,      and the slight flutter of three bees high above                                     the treetops.
